#卡特编写2006.12.05，QQ：88621517

########## 当物品栏小于1个空位##
block ItemSpace < 1
	EndWindow 10000
	
########## 物品含3W的时候##########
block Gold >= 1000
	AddGold -1000
	Giveleak1Item (19583%1,19584%1,19585%1,19586%1,19587%2,19588%2,19589%2,19590%2,14811%100,14816%100,14841%100,14906%100,14898%50,14899%50,14900%50,14901%50,14915%80,14916%80,14917%300,14918%300,14919%300,14920%1,18612%1000,18613%500,18614%250,18615%100,18621%1000,18622%500,18623%250,18624%100,18625%5,18608%500,18609%200,18610%100,18611%50,652138%73748)
	EndWindow 120133

########## 当物品栏小于1个空位##
block Gold < 1000
	EndWindow 120134
